statements: SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe' AND credits >= 2;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE credits > 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE credits = 4 ORDER BY instructor DESC
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE credits BETWEEN 2 AND 5 ORDER BY course_id ASC, instructor ASC
SELECT course_id, course_name, credits FROM Courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe' ORDER BY course_id DESC
SELECT course_name, instructor, credits FROM Courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Science%' ORDER BY instructor ASC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM students;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE max_capacity > 20;
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule FROM courses WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT student_id, first_name, enrolled_courses FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule FROM courses WHERE max_capacity > 30 ORDER BY course_name;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE enrolled_courses @> ARRAY[1, 2];
SELECT course_name, COUNT(enrolled_students) AS num_students FROM courses GROUP BY course_name HAVING num_students > 5;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE enrolled_courses > 0;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE enrolled_courses > 3 ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;

SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE course_name LIKE 'Math%' AND enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, COUNT(course_id) AS total_courses FROM students LEFT JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_courses >= 2 ORDER BY total_courses DESC;

SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE start_date < '2021-12-01' AND end_date > '2022-05-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, AVG(enrolled_courses) AS avg_courses FROM students GROUP BY first_name, last_name HAVING avg_courses < 4 ORDER BY avg_courses ASC, last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor FROM Course WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT student_id, student_name, major FROM Student WHERE major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT * FROM Enrollment ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credits FROM Course ORDER BY credits ASC;
SELECT * FROM Course WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT student_name, major FROM Student WHERE graduation_year = 2023;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credits FROM Course WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_name, major, graduation_year FROM Student WHERE major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor, credits FROM Course ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students;
SELECT course_name, course_description, instructor_name FROM courses;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_status FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = TRUE;
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = TRUE;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Science%';
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students INNER JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM enrollments LEFT JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id GROUP BY course_name ORDER BY total_students DESC;
